autobuild:
<command name="file_manipulation" options="type=create file=/ace/config.h output='#include \x22ace/config-linux.h\x22
#define TAO_HAS_IIOP 0
#define TAO_HAS_NAMED_RT_MUTEXES 1
'"/> <command name="file_manipulation" options="type=create file=/include/makeinclude/platform_macros.GNU output='ssl=1
probe=1

include $(ACE_ROOT)/include/makeinclude/platform_linux.GNU
CCFLAGS += -Wno-long-long -Wno-variadic-macros -Wwrite-strings -Wcast-align

'" /> <command name="file_manipulation" options="type=create file=/bin/MakeProjectCreator/config/default.features output='ndds=1
ssl=1
tao_no_iiop=1

'" /> <command name="file_manipulation" options="type=create file=/TAO_NO_IIOP.mwc output='workspace {
ace
apps/gperf/src
TAO/TAO_IDL
TAO/tao
}
'" />
